reviews.review: This game is definetely worth the buy. It requires strategy, teamwork, and practice. If you don't want to get addicted to this game, dont buy it.

Awesome FPS game, great graphics.

The best fun I've enjoyed over the last 10 gaming years.
This game is EXTREMELY addictive, and although the learning curve is pretty steep, it is still a lot of fun, especially playing with friends.
GREAT GAME!! Keep up the great work!

One of my favorite games of all time, and I'm not a huge fan of shooter games, but I couldn't resist this game, the mix of strategy, skill, and teamwork makes this game spectacular.
Fun game and cheap, nice to play CS again after so many years away.
This is a really awesome game. I play it mostly everyday. Fun game. Definatly recommend it :)
Best competetive game out there. Shows skill and at the same time you can have fun.

Despues de casi 4k de horas jugando a este basura, puedo decir que este juego cada vez esta mas muerto, en cualquier competitivo en cualquier mapa hay trolls, tramposos, niños, AFKS, o simplemente gente que no quiere "competir", si esto sigue así a este shooter le queda poco. Mejor invertir el tiempo en otros juegos donde por lo menos haya jugadores donde pooder jugar alguna partida para divertirse. CS DEAD
This game is pretty good, the community makes it great!
This is one of the best games I've played. It's been difficult but getting used to the game was very enjoyable. I reached competitive in only a few days and it's been great! :)

A Great Game For a Great Price.
I Always Watched Videos Of Other People Play This Game And One Day I Decided To Pick It Up. I Was Instantly Hooked And Its Always Fun To Play With Friends.
